name: Repugnant Taste
text: The target creature begins sweating a foul liquid that makes it repugnant to most living creatures. When a creature deals damage to the affected creature with a bite attack or the swallow whole ability, it must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or become nauseated until the end of its next turn. After a creature has become nauseated by this spell, each subsequent failed saving throw against the spell instead gives it the sickened condition until the end of its next turn.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (芥菜种子)
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 目标生物开始流出大量肮脏的液体，大多数的活物都对它反感。如果一个生物噬咬或是使用活吞能力对受影响的生物造成伤害，它必须通过一个强韧豁免检定，否则会反胃直到他下一轮结束为止。在一个生物因为此法术而反胃之后，随后对此法术每一次豁免失败，会获得恶心状态直至它下一轮结束为止。
